high_priority.topic: Beginner's Complete Blueprint: Your First 30 Days on Carnivore
high_priority.why_trending: Mid-January = peak New Year's beginner surge. Reddit/YouTube flooded with 'how do I start?' and 'what should I eat?' posts. Beginner content dominates all platforms.
high_priority.content_angle: Day-by-day guide from prep to week 4. Answer top beginner questions: coffee, dairy, meal planning, what to buy first
high_priority.sources: Reddit r/carnivore beginner posts, YouTube comment sections, Chomps beginner guide

high_priority.topic: Carnivore Didn't Fix Everything: The Honest Truth About Plateaus
high_priority.why_trending: YouTube creators opening up about realistic expectations. 'Carnivore didn't fix everything' conversation trending heavily. Community wants honesty about what carnivore can/can't do.
high_priority.content_angle: Real talk on plateaus, what carnivore ACTUALLY fixes, additional interventions (fermented foods, supplements), managing expectations
high_priority.sources: YouTube creator discussions, community feedback patterns

high_priority.topic: Medical Establishment Backlash: Why Experts Keep Attacking Carnivore (And What They're Missing)
high_priority.why_trending: Plant-based media ramping up anti-carnivore articles. Community frustrated with mainstream health advice. 'My doctor said I'll die' posts everywhere.
high_priority.content_angle: Why mainstream nutrition still rejects carnivore, what the research actually shows, how to talk to your doctor, legitimate concerns vs. propaganda
high_priority.sources: Plant Based News critiques, Harvard Health, community medical frustration posts

medium_priority.topic: Real 2-Week Carnivore Results: What Actually Happens (Reddit Data)
medium_priority.why_trending: Reddit threads filled with 2-week progress reports. Beginners want to know what's normal vs. exceptional. Transformation posts going viral.
medium_priority.content_angle: Compilation of Reddit 2-week experiences. What's typical: weight loss range (5-17 lbs reported), energy changes, adaptation symptoms, what to expect realistically
medium_priority.sources: Reddit r/carnivorediet 2-week results threads, Texas Real Food compilation

medium_priority.topic: Coffee on Carnivore: The Great Debate Settled
medium_priority.why_trending: Top beginner question across all platforms. Confusion about strict vs. relaxed carnivore. Coffee/beverage questions constant.
medium_priority.content_angle: Strict carnivore (no coffee) vs. relaxed approach. What the community actually does. Pros/cons. How to decide what's right for you.
medium_priority.sources: WebMD carnivore guide, CookUnity beginner guide, community polls

medium_priority.topic: Organ Meats for Skeptics: How to Actually Start Eating Them
medium_priority.why_trending: Nutrition discussion evolving beyond muscle meat. Grassland Beef/Seven Sons Farms launching organ products. Beginners asking 'do I HAVE to eat organs?'
medium_priority.content_angle: Why organs matter, how to start (liver is easiest), sourcing guide, prep that doesn't taste scary, supplements vs. whole organs
medium_priority.sources: Community sourcing questions, creator product launches, nutrition discussions
